item.title: Peritoneal Dialysis Set Correction: Baxter Issues Correction for MiniCap Extended Life Peritoneal Dialysis Transfer Sets Due to Risk of Patient Exposure to Higher Than Allowable Levels of Toxic Compound NDL-PCBA and/or NDL-PCBs
item.description: Use of Baxter MiniCap Extended Life PD Transfer Sets during peritoneal dialysis may expose patients to higher than allowable NDL-PCBAs.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Vascular Cannula Recall: Medtronic Removes Aortic Root Cannula Due to Unexpected Loose Material in the Male Luer
item.description: Aortic Root Cannulas are used during heart surgery. There is a risk of extra material in the device due to a manufacturing error.
item.dc:creator: FDA
